boid.desc:
BOID - The social supercomputer - where users are rewarded for contributing their spare computing power to academic research, such as medicine, meteorology, aerospace and machine learning.

mpt.desc:
MPT aims to revolutionize the metal packaging supply chain, by making it more cost-effective, eliminating or reducing the economic advantages of other less recyclable packaging materials.

BlockBase is a distributed system that applies many of blockchain related paradigms to provide secure and distributed database storage services.

help.desc: Answering questions about life, the universe and Discussions.app

tlos.desc: Built on EOSIO. Delegated Proof of Stake is the future of smart-contract blockchains. We combine the blazing fast execution and scalability of EOSIO software with true decentralization that makes DPoS sustainable.

krown.desc:
KROWN DAC makes tools to activate communities. The KROWN DAC has been initiated to provide a set of equitable tools for community and product leaders as well as members within communities.

dash.desc: Known for it's combination of speed, security, and optional privacy, Dash aims to be a digital cash for the world. It's your money, your way.

vigor.desc:
Vigor is a P2P decentralized automated Borrow, Lend, & Save platform powered by the EOS public blockchain. Join and help reDEFIne finance with the Vigor DAC & Protocol at [vigor.ai](https://vigor.ai).
